<div class="mp-box" id="mp-box-about"><!-- BEGIN about box -->

== About SUPERVIVE ==
<div class="mp-body" style="overflow: hidden">
SUPERVIVE is a free-to-play squad-based hero battle royale developed by Theorycraft Studios. The game features fast-paced, fluid combat with a strong emphasis on strategic movement, allowing players to jump, dash, and glide to create dynamic combos. SUPERVIVE blends elements of action combat and strategic gameplay, with a focus on teamwork, reviving teammates, and outthinking opponents. The game encourages creative playstyles by offering flexible hero kits and powers, making every match unique and engaging.
</div>

</div><!--END about box-->

<div class="mp-box" id="mp-box-contribute"><!-- BEGIN contribute box -->

== Contribute to the Wiki ==
<div class="mp-body">
{{SITENAME}} is a collaborative wiki resource that is open for anyone to edit. You don't need special permission beyond [[Special:UserLogin/signup|registering]] an account to edit most pages, and your contributions can grow the wiki and help other players.
; '''Adding content'''
:* If you are unsure of what to do or how to create a page, search for a few articles on the same topic and see what they look like. You can always view the source code in a wiki and learn from what others have done.
:* An edit doesn't have to be massive; if you feel you don't want to create whole articles, then just fixing spelling errors and broken links is enough.
:* [[Special:UserLogin/signup|Register]] to edit and track your contributions.
</div>

</div><!-- END contribute box -->
